title: Fear of Possession
author: Ronan Esperanza
body: I grew up in the Philippines, and thereâ€™s a belief that many plants, even some inanimate objects, have a spirit. If the plants are taken down, the spirit will be released and can possess people. This phenomenon discourages people in villages that commonly have the belief to harm their environment, leaving the plants and animals they find holy or possessed alone.
category: where do we go from here
